metadata.title: CVE-2019-17546 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
tif_getimage.c in LibTIFF through 4.0.10, as used in GDAL through 3.0.1 andother products, has an integer overflow that potentially causes aheap-based buffer overflow via a crafted RGBA image, related to a"Negative-size-param" condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17546` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.10+git191003-1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.10+git191003-1
libtiff6 - 4.0.10+git191003-1
libtiffxx6 - 4.0.10+git191003-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.10+git191003-1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
qtimageformats-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
